name: NorthCrossChurch
0:
”Alexa open north cross church”
”Alexa, ask north cross church to begin podcast”
”Alexa, ask north cross church to rewind thirty seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: north cross church
des:
Listen to the latest message from NorthCross Lutheran Church. 
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. 
When listening to messages you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order or ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".

You can control your position in the message using the following commands.

To rewind: "Alexa ask north cross church to rewind thirty seconds"
To fast forward: "Alexa ask north cross church to fast forward five minutes"
To go to specific point: "Alexa ask north cross church to go to eight minute mark"
